cab.content: Mariel Jem17 30Operations.SCRT.Prom :- General Delme-Radcliffe, Italy, To C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in 2,40 a,m. 7.12.17, Received 6.30 a.m. 7.12.17. 10071. Situation evening, 6th December,Italians have succeeded according to plan in withdrawing to line on the right of Frenzela Valley from Sisemol to Valstagna. There was heavy shell fire all day along the front from A&tico to Sisemol and also on Prenzela Valley as far east as Buso. About noon deter-mined attack of at least one division developed on Sisemol. Italian artillery took enemy in flank from positions south of Astico (Asiago?) and latest reports indicate that the enemy was repulsed with heavy loss. Italian troops engaged are reported to have shown steadiness and confidence.Situation normal on the rest of the front.
